  2. Heard about the 'Skull' rock found on Mars? The real story behind the discovery is much more interesting  BBC Sky at Night Magazine
  3. NASA Perserverance Rover Snaps Photo of ‘Skull’ on Mars  PetaPixel
  4. Human skull on Mars? What did NASA just discover on the red planet  The Economic Times
  5. A mysterious "skull" discovered on Mars is leaving scientists intrigued.  Farmingdale Observer

item.title: Earth’s oceans may soon turn purple - Boy Genius Report
item.description:
1. Earth’s oceans may soon turn purple  Boy Genius Report
  2. Earth's oceans were once green and could one day turn purple  Yahoo
  3. Earth’s oceans used to be green, and they could turn purple next  New Atlas
  4. Our Blue Oceans Were Once Green And Their Fate Could Be Purple Or Red  IFLScience
  5. The Ocean Hasn't Always Been Blue, And Its Original Color Could Be A Clue To Finding Alien Life  TheTravel
